reviewText: Somewhat redundant to the Love and Death on Long Island doc.

The production of this documentary attempts to keep pace with its subject: the master of action painting himself. At times its flashy imagery and music may seem slightly unnerving, however, if you consider it the mere byproduct of contagious-inspiration I think you will not only enjoy it - but maybe even start painting yourself!
This item came WAY before the expected arrival date and was in the condition the seller stated it would be.  I was very satisfied with it :)
I'm an art instructor at a local college and wanted a good video of Pollock to show my students. This biography was well done and accurate. I know the students will enjoy it.
